reviews.review_text: Small family run operation with great food. Prices are reasonable and the meals are very filling. I enjoyed my Huaracha Pastor, however my partners Beef Machete was spicy and tasty. Definitely recommend the Machete. We heard the table next to ask about the Flan but they were sold out by 7pm, must have been good! Its a small operation so you have to wait a little for your food but its worth it and freshly cooked. The couple running it are so kind and lovely.

I love this place, i can t recommend enough, it s a small place only a few tables inside, but the flavour is huge! The hot chocolate is amazing, and all the food on the menu is delicious and well portioned, I always leave feeling perfectly full, and the price is reasonable. The tres salsas  is probably my favourite but all the food I tried so far has been full of great flavours. Best authentic Mexican food in Vancouver. Vegetarian options: Great veggie options Parking: Parking can be difficult and also sorta sketchy around this area lock your doors don t leave anything in sight.

Really unique place in Vancouver focusing on pre-Hispanic Mexican food. Most of the menu items feature their homemade blue corn tortillas and theres a great selection of traditional cacao drinks (hot and iced) - stuff that I dont think you can find anywhere else in the city. So I was very curious to try, and decided to take my parents here while they were visiting because my dad requested Mexican food. Because this is not your typical Mexican food I wasnt sure if it would be what they had in mind, but it was a hit with all of us and my dad even said it might be the best Mexican food hes ever had. I got the chihatl to drink and the itacates de flor de calabaza for my meal. My first time trying chihatl, first time trying itacates, and first time trying pumpkin blossom in any form, and everything was amazing. Even though the chihatl was served icy it was still a warming drink with the cinnamon spice. The frothed texture was really cool. Very unique taste. The itacates are probably best described as Mexican samosas, but the tortillas are not deep-fried which keeps them soft. The tortilla and bean filling had an earthy flavour which paired perfectly with the flor de calabaza (I had no expectation to what pumpkin blossom would taste like but it surprisingly was very similar to pumpkin flesh). The waiter brought 3 sauces to the table for us: pico de gallo, a dark and sweet salsa roja, and a spicy salsa verde. The sauces were all delicious (I couldve eaten the roja with a spoon) but almost unnecessary as the food was so tasty even without that it felt a shame to do anything to cover it up. My parents had the Huarache Nopal and Machete Pollito and were, needless to say, very happy with those, but I didnt try them. I did try my dads hot chocolate, which is great if youre not so adventurous since it basically just tasted like a really high quality but mainstream hot choc. Also note the drinks are served in bowls made from large dried gourd husks(?) which provides a unique drinking experience. The prices are really fair for what youre getting. The total for our party (3 entrees and 2 drinks) came to about $75 before tip. The place is small and really cozy, and while the staff wasnt the most outgoing, they were polite and seemed to really care to make sure we were enjoying everything. I would really recommend this place for a truly different Mexican dining experience.

What a Nice spot ! After checking the review, we went there with my partner. The place is small but we find place after just 5min. The staff is really gentle, always happy to answer your questions. We order the Yuca fries, the elotes and the chorizo machete. Everything was amazing ! I definitely recommend the Yuca fries ! The machete is the perfect food for Sharing. We also took the mango juice, was also really good, perfect drink for calm the spice of the jalapeno Guys, if you are looking for quiet spot, with good staff and really tasty mexican food, thats all what you Will have here. Price is clearly fair for the quality of the Product ! (47$ for all this)

The best Mexican restaurant in Vancouver with the most beautiful ancestral design. Delicious and healthy food. The service it s always kind and friendly starting form the amazing owner I   Machete Vegetarian options: All Machete s food it s delicious vegetarian or not

Marvelous and unique mexican restaurant. You must try the machete (huge blue corn quesadilla with a delicious variety of stuffings). Vegetarian dishes available. Traditional ancient beverages are just incredible. Widely recommended
Very nice Mexican restaurant with a different vibe from your regular joint. They have multiple choices to accommodate most people. Highly recommended

The best Mexican food Ive had in Vancouver so far - and the owners were so friendly. I will definitely be back to try more of their menu. Dont leave with trying the esquites - you can thank me later. Food : 5/5
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hello Emma, thank you very much for leaving us your comment! For us it is a pleasure to serve our customers! Welcome always! And yes, the Esquites are delicious, we prepare them with a lot of love, apart from the fact that our corn comes the same since it is planted with a lot of love!
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Hola Emma muchas gracias por dejarnos tu comentario! Para nosotros es un placer atender a nuestros clientes! Bienvenida siempre! Y siii los Esquites son deliciosos los preparamos con mucho amor aparte de que nuestro maiz viene igual desde que se siembra con mucho amor !

reviews.review_text: The best eating experience in Vancouver Ive ever had. We went here just to look for Mexican food but left with an overwhelmingly positive feeling. The food was delicious, fresh and filling, made with natively cultivated ingredients from Mexico. While also pesticide- and GMO-free, the price was fair unlike those other restaurants that overcharge for labelling their food organic. We had the yuca fries, meztli cacao drink, birria tacos and rey machete. Their dining space was small, homely and full of life. The service provided by Ceci and her staff was friendly, timely and sweet. During our conversation, Ceci showed such love towards her cultures cuisine and sharing it to us with authenticity. The neighborhood kids even came in to talk to the staff. Its obvious to see that theyre an integral part of their local community. We dined in total silence; whenever we did speak it was only to share our awe of the food in front of us. Overall, it felt like a mothers cooking in the best way imaginable. I urge anyone to try this hidden gem of a restaurant out! Everyone here deserves praise and support for their phenomenal service.
A special experience. Highly recommend. Loved being able to taste the horchata long after. Would definitely come again

Delicious food ! Felt like in Mexico - very authentic atmosphere, and very friendly staff ! We had the elotes (most tender and tasty corn), tacos (loved the birria ones), Yuka fries (just so good!). We were here on holidays, but if we ever come back to Vancouver, we ll stop by Machete !
Ive been here quite a few times and now and it has always been consistent. High quality, very healthy, friendly staff , supporting local, and great taste ! What more can you ask for ?
A taste of Mexico, right here in Vancouver. I tried Elote for the first time and it was delicious! I even got to practice my Spanish at no extra cost. The food was amazing!

Absolutely amazing the Chiefs top notch he looks as good as his meals look and  tastes .The Service is by far the best Ive experienced in Vancouver with Loco Good energy you will not be disappointed. my Word I cant wait to go back for another feast Kid-friendliness: Family atmosphere
Fantastic decor and music. I tried a taco and the yuca fries, both were excellent. Next time Ill bring a bigger appetite and try the 2 foot machete : )
We love the machete and hot chocolate. We went late at night and had the place to ourselves. Great service and ambiance!
Loved loved the authentic food her. Must must try in Vancouver. The drink was something else altogether

This is truly a hidden gem. It is like stepping off of Main Street in Vancouver into a restaurant in a traditional village in Mexico. This is not your cheap TexMex fast food. It is traditional real Mexican food prepared with love and respect for their heritage and tradition. The flavours are amazing, big and bright. The pozol chocolate beverage was so different and interesting. The chicken enmoladas with a traditional mole was very good. We didn t try the machetes, next time.

Every single detail of my experience at Machete was delightful! The staff was very attentive and ensured I got the best out of my visit, and the food was delicious and plenty. I recommend the itacates, can t get enough of them! Their coconut lemonade is also top notch. Will definitely be coming back every time I crave authentic Mexican food :-)

Went for the first time last night and it was hands down my favourite dining experience Ive had in recent memory!! The food was amazing and the atmosphere feels so welcoming. Will definitely be coming back next time Im in vancouver!
Love! I m not Mexican, but I think it s great. The drinks are a must.

Truly awesome spot you need to check out. Its very obvious these are people who are very proud of their heritage, and take great pride in the food they sell. Such wholesome, good, healthy food, simple and authentic. Glad we stopped in!

Im fascinated with the flavour and quality of the ingredients. The portion of the machete is really big (60 cm ) and 1 could feet 2 or 3 people. I also order a drunk called posol and let me tell you how much I regret not ordering 2. Its an ancestral drink with a corn and chocolate base so refreshing!!! This place exceeds my expectations. Cant wait to order it again!
An excellent place to eat, and for drinks they have pozol, a thick drink made from cocoa and corn of Mesoamerican origin that is still consumed and very popular in southern Mexico.
Awesome little mexican place. Food made with love and care with healthy alternatives to traditionally fried staples. Prices are very reasonable. Highly recommended

Ceci attended in an outstanding way. Very polite and willing to explain in detail the process of elaborating the dishes. They are authentic Mexican. I live in Mexico and can assure this place is better than several in Mexico. Congratulations!!!! We will be back soon. Vegetarian options: They have several vegetarian options Wheelchair accessibility: Enough space to access and to sit in front of a table

Great place!!! Food very tasty and organic! Love variety of non alcoholic beverages. Interior is very colorful and authentic plus staff is very friendly and helpful. Would definitely advise to visit that restaurant and try really tasty Mexican food

Absolutely delicious Mexican food. The Elotes is amazing (its a corn dish; Id never had anything like it before and it is SO good). The restaurant is not air conditioned so if its a hot day, you may prefer to get takeout instead.

The food here is delicious and never disappoints. I used to eat here when they worked out of a kitchen on industrial dr and so happy to see they have opened their own restaurant. This by far the best Mexican food I have ever had in Vancouver. The tortillas are handmade and the filling is not greasy at all. It feels like I am eating real food, it actually tastes healthy. I think if you eat here you will not be disappointed.

The coconut lemonade was absolutely mind blowing. I know the tacos are great here. The ingredients, the menu, everything about the food is incredible, but TRY THE COCONUT LEMONADE.  As someone who cant often try creamy drinks because of dairy, this was absolutely to die for.

This place is the something else!!! Would rate the food 10 out of 10 and their service 12 out of 10. The best party food we ever had, delicious food and affordable prices. A friend of mind recommended them and I cant thank her enough. The tacos, veggies, and the rest of the amazimg party trays we had, which I cant even pronounce the names of, were astonishing. Would highly recommend the Chorizo sausage, best sausage I ever had. Thank you for catering and making a very unique and special evening.

Authentic Mexican food, say it from a Mexican congratulations to Machete for achieve to cook real Mexican food with the limited ingredients that Vancouver can offer. I am sorry for the negative comments for the random haters that first of all they are only personal preference and not Mexicans. I really appreciate the effort you make for cook real tortillas. I like the concept of the ghost kitchen even the people doesn t understand it.
Loved it.. I had the Huarache Carne Asada   Amazing flavor

This place was amazing! I loved how authentic everything seemed, from the bowls to the clay water jugs. The food was delicious I had an enfrijolada and my wife a vegetarian machete. Never had those before (and we have had a lot of Mexican food in the past) and absolutely loved it. Also recommend the elote and toston!

Hi, I knew about Machete from a latin festival and we decided to try their food and is so authentic   Im from Mexico and Im always sceptical about Mexican food in Canada and Machete has THE flavour that reminded me of being back home. Its so good and they give a friendly service.
Hands down the best tasting Mexican in Vancouver! Tacos are delicious and I could write an essay on how good their sauces/condiments are! If you crave Mexican, Machete is the place to go.
This is simple the BEST Mexican restaurant in the city. You will be taken to a Mexican experience with their delicious food, music and decor. Thanks so much Cecy!!! We will be coming back soon.
Had their machete back when they were at the takeout location on industrial ave. Happy to see them have a dine in space now! Great food and friendly service!

I m Mexican and I can assure you this is the place. The flavor is real! not some Americanized  Mexican  food. The best breakfast that I had so far in Vancouver. You should go! Don t doubt twice! Thank you to the owners and all employees of Machete for sharing the real flavors of Mexico!
Probably the best Mexican food Ive had in the city so far. Prices are fair. Birria machete was good but a bit expensive. Strongly consider their chicharron itacates, drinks, fries

I couldnt have asked for more fresh, nutritious, and delicious food. Best molle I ever had. Staff was super friendly and explained the menu. Also, the owners work directly in the restaurant and make sure everything is good. Definitely recommend everyone tries their food.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Jonathan! It is our pleasure to serve you and yes, we spend most of our time there since our official Chef is also the owner of Machete and his mission is to share with the world about the importance of consuming nutritious foods and taking care of health through food! Hugs and thanks for your comment!
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Jonathan! Es nuestro placer atenderlos y si!nosotros pasamos la mayoria del tiempo ahi ya que nuestro Chef oficial tambien es el owner de Machete y su mision es compartir con el mundo acerca de la importancia de consumir alimentos nutritivos y cuidar de la salud por medio de los alimentos! Abrazos y gracias por tu comentario!

reviews.review_text: It was friendly fast service and a good selection.  I had the cactus which hadnt had for years and I inhaled it lol. Totally recommend
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much! We are always waiting for you!

reviews.review_text: I discovered this place by accident but the next time will be no accident. Very unique style and wonderful food, had lots to take home since we needed to order one of everything.

One of a kind Mexican resturant. The food was made with love and care and tasted excellent. The host was very helpful and polite and explained the dishes in detail. It almost felt like home cooked Mexican food and not the American version that we have trained ourselves to eat. A must try in Vancouver downtown!!
Amazing Mexican food. Horchata is excellent and the machetes are a great share dish. Highly recommend the Pollito Machete
Great authentic Mexican food. Dont expect anything fancy, expect however high quality, fresh and healthy ingredients and fantastic food. Service is also super friendly. Recommended!

Food is amazing, really one of the most authentic Mexican places Ive found un vancouver, I was really surprised with the tortillas, its difficult to find good tortillas outside of Mexico. Location is not the best, because of the hastings type of people that are near the area but youll survive. Once inside its great.
Friendly and fast service with authentic food that leaves youre tongue tingly with excitement for not a long time but a good time
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you!!! We do things with a lot of love!!
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Thank you!!! Hacemos las cosas con mucho amor!!

reviews.review_text: Best Mexican food I had in Canada (not only in Vancouver). My wife and I came for lunch based on the reviews and were not disappointed. We had a Pollito Machete, the Nopales (vegan tacos) and the Meztli to drink. Everything was DELICIOUS!!!! Authentic place, music and food.
Great tacos and the machete was fantastic! Full of cheese in the machete.
Excellent food with variety of dishes. Very affordable prices and large portions. Good vegetarian and vegan options. Friendly service. Will be back.
The food here is excellent! It also has excellent vegan cheese, if the delicious Oaxaca cheese doesn t suit you

The food was awesome. we ordered breakfast, which they made just for us because they dont have it on the menu. They are very flexible, and the chef was great and accommodating.  The atmosphere was good and the service was excellent. Its my favorite Mexican place from now on.

Superb! I am Mexican, and I continuously travel throughout Mexico, actively looking for places with delicious and authentic food... it is a pleasant surprise to find a restaurant in Vancouver that is authentic, creative, and delicious. If this restaurant were in Mexico City, I would still eat there and enjoy their unique and exquisite food!

I wasn t really sure what to order so I got the Machete Tapatio. Didn t realise it would be the size of a baguette! Very delicious! Also ordered the yuca fries cause I LOVE yuca, even my little Mexican doggo loved those. For gluten free eats I was thrilled. The blue corn tortilla are legit. Highly recommend plus the food tastes so fresh and light makes you feel better about indulging in comfort eats. Mexican food holds a close place in my heart and I don t generally find legit Mexican outside of Mexico. The people who make this food clearly care about what they are putting out and it shows through the flavours and care taken. Don t miss out on this! Can t wait to experience more of their menu.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much ! We are waiting for you whenever you like! It is a pleasure for us to offer you a little piece of our ancestral Mexico!
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias ! Te esperamos cuando gustes! Es un placer para nosotros brindarles un pedacito de nuestro Mexico ancestral!

reviews.review_text: Ordered the machete mestizo, quesabirrias, horchata, and pozol through UberEats. Everything was tasty and fresh. Id definitely order again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks James! We are now open for dine-in at 1007 Main Street! We will wait for you !
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias James! Ahora estamos abiertos para dine-in en 1007 Main Street! Te esperamos !

reviews.review_text: SO flavourful and the cheese was amazing! Highly recommend.
great authentic Mexican food! staff is super friendly and nice! highly recommend.
The Best authentic Mexican food in Vancouver. Variety of specialty drinks and main dishes that cannot be found anywhere! Nice and warm atmosphere, we didnt want to leave and will be back soon!
The best place I visit in Vancouver. Delicious, fresh and healthy. Atmosphere very welcoming thanks to kind people who take care of you.
This is the most legit Mexican food that I have found in Vancouver. Amazing and well priced as well!!

By far, the best Mexican restaurant in Vancouver. High quality food ingredients and amazing diverse dishes and drinks. Well balanced, super tasty, and unique menu. And very important, inclusive, they offer dishes for diets like keto paleo vegan etc. The restaurant is a very mexican colourfull happy place. Excellent service. I mean, perfect!!!    owners and staff has put lots of love in this business!!! I feel very happy after this experience!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your beautiful comment! In reality we do everything with a lot of love and a lot of passion! Let our ancestral Mexico and our roots be felt in every dish!   We are always waiting for you! Machete is your home!
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias por tu hermoso comentario! En realidad todo lo hacemos con mucho amor y mucha pasion! Que se sienta nuestro Mexico ancestral y nuestras raices en cada platillo!   Los esperamos siempre! Machete es su casa!

reviews.review_text: You can absolutely taste the quality and love in their food. Had the birria machete and chorizo tacos. They were packed with flavour, super fresh ingredients and generously filled. They missed a drink in my order and the owner drove all the way to my house to drop it off personally. Even added an extra treat for the trouble. These guys are amazing at their craft and theres a clear pride in ownership. Wish you guys the best of luck, you have a customer for life.
Offers an authentic healthy variety of fresh food which is not easy to comeby. A special treat with the ancient Corn tortillas. Feeling full and light.

Great place to dinner or lunch, truly native corn and handmade food bring it from Guadalajara, Jalisco, Mexico, excellent costumer service, they always receive you with a smile. The chef it is a profesional nutritionist and she takes care of the quality on every detail. Give your self the opportunity to taste a piece of Mexico.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much Ruby! Thank you for taking the time to write to us and share your experience with us!
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Muchas gracias Rubi! Gracias por darte el tiempo de escribirnos y compartirnos tu experiencia!

reviews.review_text: I ordered from them via delivery apps on two occasions recently. I tried the following: 1. Esquite 2. Machete Tapatio 3. Machete Champion 4. Gordita with Butter & Cheese 5. Quesabirria 6. Pozole (pork) They were all really good - really fresh and delicious. Truly reminded me of what I had on the streets of Mexico. Their rustic tortillas brought back memories of a small hole-in-the-wall shop I stumbled upon in central Merida that just sold these small simple quesadillas and nothing else, but they had a long line up of locals. The gordita may seem simple, and it is, but its really about enjoying fresh dairy stuff inside blue corn masa. And my order had a very generous, but appropriate, amount of cheese. Im glad to have discovered this restaurant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for ordering with us! We are now open as a restaurant at 1007 Main Street! We will wait for you!!! Always welcome!!
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias por ordenar con nosotros! Ahora ya estamos abiertos como restaurante en 1007 Main Street! Te esperamos!!! Bienvenidos siempre!!

reviews.review_text: Delicious super authentic food! The iced drinks were refreshing and super tasty!

Excellent, authentic Mexican food. The blue corn tortillas were fresh and tacos were stuffed with tasty meat and toppings. The Pastor tacos were my personal favourite. Looking forward to exploring more of the menu.
Best authentic Mexican restaurant. Im Mexican and food is just amazing. Service is great too. Highly recommend. If you want to try good Mexican food THIS is the place
Small place, large menu, lots of vegitarian options, great food and service
Oh my gosh- this restaurant was incredible! The BEST food and lovely vibes, Alex and Cecilia are delightful! Will always come here whenever I m in Vancouver!

It was our first visit today and it won t be our last! The food is clearly prepared with love and attention. Great flavours and authentic and fresh ingredients. The service was so friendly and welcoming.
Came to the event at rocky mountaineer and the food was great. Will be checking out the restaurant soon.

This is real Mexican food, here you ll find what we actually have for a meal and with real wholesome ingredients. Many vegan options available and they are delicious. Must try the huitlacoche and nopales
I ordered Machette Champion steak and cheese jalapeno avocado, it was  so good I finished the whole thing, (normally its too big for 1 person). Will go back to try another staff on the menu.
Delicious homemade tasting Mexican food. Friendly staff, and welcoming atmosphere. Able to cater to and impress my vegan palette. A must try!
Super unique, hidden gem Mexican spot with incredible food! Cocoa drinks were fantastic. Def going back to this one!
Absolutely delicious food. How have I not heard of this place until now. Vegetarian options: Happy to see veggie options
Great quality, authentic Mexican food! Love the healthy considerations. You can tell everything is made with love.
Delicious Mexican food, the cocoa drinks are really tasty and unique!

The best Mexican and healthy food street food in town!      . We love the vegetarian Machetes they make   and Pozol!!!!! This drink is typical in my hometown in Mexico and is amazing to have such a great version of it here in Vancouver   . I would absolutely recommend this place to everyone who s looking for an authentic Mexican and traditional street food    you won t regret

You can TELL this spot cares about what they do, and that they are bringing their heritage forward. A hidden gem, and an amazing experience all in one! Vegetarian options: Extremely varied, lost of unique offerings.

Delicious and healthy Mexican food. Yes I said healthy. These folks also make their tortillas from scratch by grinding the masa daily. You can tell the ingredients are first class and fresh. My family and I have gone enough times that we have tried literally everything. Every now and then, the menu would have something new. The Machetes are of course my clear favourite. The Elotes are a traditional recipe so not quite what we see in North America. Its more of the chewy sticky corn variety. Polite and excellent service. Please go and try this wonderful place.
The best tortillas and authentic Mexican tacos in Canada. Hands down. And they have blue corn tortillas!

This is THE authentic Mexican food in Vancouver. I love Mexican food and have been trying some for last 5 years but nothing even comes close to this. Im definitely coming back for all the things I havent tried.

The food here is crazy delicious!   We had elotes and a vegetarian and a meat itacates. Really good quality fresh ingredients and made with care.  So good!  Honestly best Mexican food Ive eaten in Vancouver.  Definitely going back for more

My wife and I just tried this place for the first time last night and it was really great! I was impressed to see huitlacoche on the menu, as well as a few things that were totally new to me. We will definitely be going back for more, and I cant wait til they have dine-in service!
ive had it 3 times now, its been delicious everytime! I really liked the tapatio machete, its basically a foot-long birria taco! so fresh and tasty!

This place is awesome. Ring the doorbell for service and wait patiently. Its worth it. Pretty much just takeout, but they have two picnic tables outside. I really dont think you could wrong with anything on the menu. Fresh, delicious, full of flavour. Gracias!
Easily the best Mexican food I ve had in Vancouver. Handmade tortillas and salsa. They are super kind and very accommodating of my partners dairy allergy.
Visit this place, the food is quite good and flavorful, cheap and clean

We have been ordering from them through ubereats and food is GREAT. My husband who is from LA and grew up eating authentic mexican food, was so sad to learn that he has gluten sensitivity and that Vancouver lacks really good mexican food, but we found this place and he approves!!! I love the food as well. We are hoping to go to the restaurant in person soon :)

Went there yesterday with a friend as we had previously passed by it on our adventures. Decided to try their Machete (I got the Champion and she got the tapatio). The decision making was based on the fact that its 2ft of quesadilla. Wish more and more delicious food was measured this way. Everything we ordered was delicious. Great combination of meat, cheese, and cactus. Its a bit tucked away in the industrial zone but definitely worth the visit and maybe another trip in the future to try their other items.

I am from Colombia and have been to Mexico multiple times. I can say this is BY FAR the best authentic Mexican I ve ever tried in this country. If you are into tex-mex or american style, this is not the place for you. This is pure flavour, quality and service!!! Thanks Ceci for making this available.
Love the machete with Calabasa flowers and the pozol is so refreshing! Highly recommend and I will definitely be returning
The best Mexican food Ive had in B.C.

Tried the Champion machete, three different types of tacos, and salsitas. Everything tasted so fresh and delicious, hands down the best Mexican food I ve had in Western Canada. Can t wait to come back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much D R . Welcome!!!

reviews.review_text: The food is really good and so flavourful. Got one of the popular machete dishes on soil the dishes and it was great. Even better the next day as left overs
A bit expensive, but still great food (esp. Carnitas tacos and Quesabirria tacos) and great service.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your comment! Its actually not expensive at all for the type of quality ingredients we use! All ultra-processed free! We are very glad that you liked our taquitos! They are made with a lot of love and full of nutrients!
reviews.response_from_owner_translated_text: Gracias por tu comentario! En realidad no es nada caro por el tipo de calidad de ingredientes que manejamos! Todo libre de ultraprocesados! Nos da mucho gusto que te haya gustado nuestros taquitos! Estan hechos con mucho amor y llenos de nutrientes!

reviews.review_text: Machete makes the best Mexican artesanal food! The huaraches, corn well everything. Machete has the traditional healthy Mexican flavor. You have to try it!!!
